messages.content: What is the purpose of Harronode in ComfyUI?
Harronode is designed to streamline the process of building prompts for use with the Harrlogos SDXL LoRA within the ComfyUI environment.
How does Harronode make prompt building easier?
Harronode simplifies prompt building by providing a user-friendly interface that allows quick assembly of custom prompts and access to all built-in activation terms.
Can users modify prompts freely with Harronode?
Yes, Harronode offers full creativity, allowing users to modify their prompts in any way they'd like with the 'Editable' mode.
Harronode can be installed either through the Comfy Node Manager or manually by cloning the repository into the 'custom_nodes' directory of the ComfyUI setup.
What steps are involved in using Harronode within ComfyUI?

To use Harronode, add the 'Harronode - Prompt Builder' node to your canvas, input text and set weight, select the number of modifiers, choose from built-in activation words, and wire the node into your project.
Where can users seek support or contribute to Harronode?
For support, suggestions, or contributions, users can visit the GitHub repository, submit an issue/pull request, or contact the creators on Discord.
Who are the designers and writers of Harronode?
Harronode was designed and written by HarroweD and QuadMoon.
